Glasford issues boil order

Wednesday
Mar 14, 2012 at 12:01 AM Mar 14, 2012 at 1:02 PM

A boil order was issued Tuesday night for the entire village of Glasford.



The boil order was issued after a water main break and will remain in effect until further notice, according to a village news release.
